root.title: 80 Kurgak II
root.place: Inscription is on north extremity of the mountain Kurgak on horizontal surface in 70-80 m from the inscription Kurgak I.
root.general: The surface size is 85 x 76 cm.
root.description: The text is horizontal consists of 6 characters.
root.size: Height of characters is between 3 and 6 cm.
root.investigation: Maichikov found in 2005. Publication: Kocheev 523.

pdf.f_title: Свод древнетюркских рунических памятников Горного Алтая. Горно-Алтайск: АКИН, 2006. – 52 с.

refs.ref: Кызласов И.Л. Рунические письменности евразийских степей.-М. 1994.-С. 318.-Рис. 18.
